participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Jordan enjoys expressing himself through art and has a tendency to be a bit of a loner.
participant_1.background: my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Struggling with self-esteem, Mark often feels isolated and spends his free time on social media, reflecting his unhappiness.
participant_2.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i work at a nursing home. my wife left me and took my children.

content.text: I am doing well. I am a little ocd.
I am a professional, i am a professional at the moment.
Yes, i make wineglass candles. I am a very experienced artist.
Yes i am a bit of a tea drinker are you a famous twitch streamer?
That is good to hear. I am a professional artist.
I do not. I am afraid of commitment.
I am a bit overwhelmed. I am a loner.
I live alone, but i am a loner.
I would like to be a dog.
I am not sure what you mean.
Yes i do. I love to eat fish.
No, that is a good idea!
